S.FORM: == Cung-cen-ci-nen-tang 中正紀念堂 == Cung-cen-ci-nen-tan itida i Cung-hau-min-kuo-Tay-pei-se-cung-cen-ci a Kuo-cia-ci-nen a nisangaan a luma' u kining tu mabelecay nu Cung-tung ci Cing-cung-cen a nisangaan, u satabakiay nu sapikining a nisangaan, mikuwanay u Cung-hua-min-kuo-wen-hua-pu sasaay a " Kuo-li-cung-cen-ci-nen-tan kun-li-cu'". hamin nu kitadaan makaala tu 250,000 pin-fan-kun-ce, kakiningan a tadaluma' a talakaw makaala tu 70 kun-ce, labu a putahan nu tasaay a luma'an u Yi-wen-kun-cen", putah nu timulan amisan idaw ku nipisangan tu Kuo-cia gagikian atu kuo-cia dadatukan, pulung han pangangan u " Kuo-cia tusaay a kitidaan", u mamikuwan tu migikiay nu tatelungan. ya hekal idaw ku papahanhannan, u sasagikian nu tabakiay a kitidaan, hina patinaku tu nipahelakan a tuudan atu migikiay, nu tayniay a namakacuwacuwaay a kanatalan nu tademaw itinitu pahalhal. tada sangan nu luma'an, tabakiay a dadan, putah atu adawang u " Tay-wan-min-cu-ci-nen-yen-ci" ku ngangan, u sin-cen-yen wenhua cense wiyenhuy " aydaay a wen-hua-pu" patucekan u Kuo-tin-ku-ci", walian a panan, cung-san-nan-lu makakenih ku dadan atu yen-ci u " cung-cen-ci-nen-tan" a ngangan u sapituki i Tay-pei-se-cen-hu u wen-hua-cen-kun. . luit歷史 aydaay a kakiningan a kitidaan, u caysiwseplim mihcaan "mince 38 mihcaan", kacukaymasan a Tay-wan-ze'-ce-se-ci-tay-wan-cen sanpaw citi, atu caysiwsipsip mihcaan " cawhe 19 mihcaan" sabaw cacay a bulat kalingatuan nu hitay a sakacacay nu tektekan. caysiwsiplim mihcaan Cung-hua-min-kuo miala mikuwan tu Tay-wan a nikudan, lawpes hantu kiya tusaay. caysiwlimsep mihcaan kataynian tu nu kahulaman, tastashantu, ina kitidaan mala nu hitay a Cun-se-lin-pu, Lin-cin-cun-se-li-pu atu Sin-pin-se-lin-pu a kitidaan. u lin-sen-nan-lu sipakayda mibetas ku dadan, Cung-cen-ci-nen-tan patideng sa sipakayda i sasa nu lala' a muculil. . tawyaay a Cung-tun mitusa a malaKuo-min-tan cung-cay ci Cing-cun-ce itida i caysiwpiclim mihcaan sepat a bulad lima a demiad malibalucu' a mabelec, u sin-cen-yen ku malamikuwanay tu sakabelec a wi-yen-huy, itawya tu enemay a bulad patideng tu Cung-ce-ci-nen-tan nu sapikining tu sabaw enem a tademawan nu mikuwanay, u sin-cen-yen itida i caysiwpicnem mihcaan cacay a bataan patideng tu cung-cen-ci-nen-tan a ce-daw-wi-yen-huy. nisingkiwan satu, u yen-san-ta-fan-tin ku misikiay ci Ying-cuo-cen ku misikiay, u nisikian a luma mialatu nu Na-cin-cung-san-lin a waywayan. kilul sa i caysiwpicnem mihcaan cacay a bataan a bulat tulu a bataan idaw ku cacay a demiadan malingatu mitahaw, caysiwpicpic mihcaan caycay a bulat milingatu misakakawaw, mikawaway tina kawawan u Zun-min-kun-cen-kun-se, caysiwwalsep mihcaan tulu a bulad lucay a demiad mahedek, sin-cen-yen patideng tu " cung-cen-ci-nen-tan-kun-li-cuo-pei-cu'". ". caysiwwalsep sepat bulad sepat demiad, pilaksisikian nu Cung-cen-ci-nen-tan atu nikapatayan ni Cen-cun-ce pulung han i tawya a sikawaw, makaala tu sepat a malebut ku milabuay a tademaw, hekalay nu kanatalan a tademaw makaala tu sepat a lasubuan nu tademaw, sakatusa a demiad taneng tu tayda ku namakacuwacuwaay a tademaw tayda miadih, tawya a mihcaan pitu a bulat cacay a demiad tatengan mala " cung-cen-ci-nen-tan kunlicu'", u Tay-pei-se-cen-hu ciw-yi-ci. caysiwwalnem mihcaan, cung-cen-ci-nen-tan sumad han u ciw-yi-pu mikuwanay, mahedek tu patideng tu cudad sa sumad han ku ngangan u " Kuo-li-cung-cen-ci-nen-tan-kun-li-cu'". 1980年4月4日, ". caysiwsiwsep mihcaan tulu a bulat sikawaw tu ye-pay-he-sye-wen, mapulung namin ku micudaday itida i cun-cen-ci-nen-tang " aydaay a sakalihalay a putahan" musaluimeng a mueneng, patahekal tu sasakamuen tu " kaysangen ku kuo-min-ta-huy", " lawpesen ku tun-yen-kan-lung-se-ci-lin-se-tiw-kun", masasakamu tu " kuo-se-huy-yi", atu " cen-cin-kay-ke-se-cin-pew" saepat a ayiwkiwan nu sasakamuen. 1990年3 . tusepseppic mihcaan tulu bulat tusa demiad, ci Ceng-suy-pen sihu a zitayan a ciw-yi-pu sumaden ku kuo-li-cun-cen-ci-nen-tang tu kuo-li-tay-wan-min-cu-ci-nen-kun", hetiken malasakasepat a sulaladan nu ceng-hu, ina kawaw caay sipakayda i sin-cen tu lipuing misumad a mihang, pahetiken nu ciw-yi-pu ku nipacaitan tu aadihan atu paya nu adawan a ta-cung-ce-cen a sulitan, malawilaw namin ku katuuday, kilulsa u Tay-pei-se-cen-hu-wen-hua-ci u "wen-ce-hua" hiyaen ku cung-cen-ci-nen-tan a cukedan, paya nu ta-cen-ce-cun, putah nu kun-yen, langad atu salining, palasumamaday a liwan nu babalaki sa. lima bulat cacay a bataan demiad, ciw-yi-pu-cen ci Tu-cen-sen mihapu satu, patucek tu " kuo-li-tay-wan-min-cu-ci-nen-kun a cudadan". lima bulat sabaw siwa demiad, tawyaay a cung-tun ci Cen-suy-pen mihapu tu tatengaay a ngangan. tusepseppic mihcaan sabaw cacay bulat siwa dimiad wen-cin-huy u cuked nu kuo-li-tay-wan-min-cu-ci-nen-kun, misuayaway a kangpangan, sakalihalay a putahan, salining, sulit han tu kuo-tin-ku-ci, nika caay kedai ku nu pei-se-cen-hu nipatucekan tu langan atu "ta-cung-ce-cen" nu sulitan. 2007年3月2日, "字樣. tusepsepwal mihcaan walu bulat tucay demiad, ni Ma-ing-ciw sihu itida i sin-cen-yen pisasakamuan, pabesut han milawpes ku kuo-li-tay-wan-min-cu-ci-nen-kun-cu-ce-kuy-cen", tawya a demiad manukasen ku kuo-li-cun-cen-ci-nen-tang-kun-li-cu'" a masakaputay. Tusepsepsiw mihcaan pitu bulat sabaw pitu demiad, saan ku wen-cin-huy tu kuo-tin-ku-ci "Tay-wan-min-cu-ci-nen-kun" sumaden ku ngangan u Cung-cen-ci-nen-tan". tusepsepsiw mihcaan pitu bulat tusep demiad, malingatu aca pacait, nika i pananay a kangpang tu sulit " sakalihalay a putahan", caay pakabiti kina " ta-cung-ce-cen". 2008年8月21日, "掛回. tusepcaypic mihcaan tusa a bulat, ci Cay-ing-wen azitay nu wen-hua-pu-cen ci Cen-li-cun ku pacukelay tina cung-cen-kakiningan misumad, miawda tu sitangahay a tademaw, pahetiken ku canancanan nu ceng-cung-cen a tuudan,pasaluimengen ku nipadadiwan tu " Ceng-ku kakiningan a dadiwan", cung-cen-yi-lan, cea-se-tin, zuy-yen-tin, ce-cin-tin, min-lin-yi-lang, cay-yi-yi-lang, cung-cen gagikian nu hatidaay a sapaadih tu gagagikian pasumaden namin tu aasipen tu sulit tu tungduhan. tusa a bulat tusa a bataan idaw ku pitu a demiad, u Cung-hua-min-kuo wen-hua-pu mihapu tu sakay tutuwal kakiningan a kawawan matalaw a masasuidis ku syakayay a tademaw, nanu tawya tu tusa a bulat tusa a bataan idaw ku walu a dimiadan kalingatuan tu mihmihcaan tu tusa a bulat tusa a bataan idaw ku walu a deimadan a edepen namin ku cung-cen-ka kiningan mihibang tawya a demiad. 2017年2月, . kangpang 牌樓 kangpang nu cung-cen-ci-nen-tan, misuayaw tu cung-san-nan-lu atu kuo-cia-tu-su-kun, talakaw lusep, ahebal walsep a kuncean, u satabakiay nu Tay-pei macimacian a kangpangan. u kangpang nipitucekan u " lima a lalumaan enem ku cuked sabaw cacay ku nikatatungduhan, u Cung-hua-min-kuo satalakaway nu sangaan a luma'an, hekal mahida u langdaway a demiadan a sumilaway atu salengacay ku tadakulit. tu mihmihcaan nu kalimulakan nu kanatalm, ya kangpang idaw ku nipipatata' tu cacay a bataan nu Cung-hua-min-kuo hataan. . satalakaway a kangpangan idaw ku sulit tu " ta-cung-ce-cen", ina kangpangan pangangan han tu " ta-cun-ce- tadapanan", tasepseppic mihcaan sabaw tusa a bulat walu a dimiad, sumad han pangangan tu " sakalihalay a putahan" sepatay a sulitan. misumad henay, naidaw ku mibelihay atu patidengan a tademaw masasuliang. Tawyaay a nipaduhepitan a sulit u "ta-cung-ce-cun" sepatay a sulitan uniO-yeng-sun a sulitan, ci Cin-siw-yi kina patucekay, sayaway kahemekan ni Cin a midatengay a tademawan namaka ci Wan-yen-min nakamuan a cudadan "cun-si-lu", " bahalehan kina ta-cung-ce-cun sipahetik". caay henay ka hetik, caay henay paheci ku sakakaay tina kawawan, tusaay tu a mihcaan binacadan caay henay katineng cimaay hakiya kina misulitay, saan ku nipabaliw hakiya ci Cing-cun-cen kina misulitaytu sa." katukuh tu tusepseppic a mihcaan tu nipilawpesan tina ka cinglawan a kawawan, misulitay tu hudi a tademaw ci Yeng-cia-lin sakamusa misulitay a tademaw namaka u culay, telay u tawsu ku sapatumi' tu sumanahay a lala' ku sapisulit. tawyaay miawda tu matinengay tu hudian nu misulitay a tademaw patucekan nu heni awnio-ti a sulitan sa, acaay kaluo-kun, amipatucek tu niedawan a tukian, tawya misulit. " ta-cung-min", " ta-siw-min" nida tu a nisulitan. .

== Cong-cen-ci-nen-tang 中正紀念堂 == Cong-cen-ci-nen-tan itida i Cong-hao-min-koo-Tay-pei-se-cong-cen-ci a Koo-cia-ci-nen a nisangaan a loma' o kining to mabelecay no Cong-tong ci Cing-cong-cen a nisangaan, o satabakiay no sapikining a nisangaan, mikowanay o Cong-hoa-min-koo-wen-hoa-po sasaay a " Koo-li-cong-cen-ci-nen-tan kon-li-co'". hamin no kitadaan makaala to 250,000 pin-fan-kon-ce, kakiningan a tadaloma' a talakaw makaala to 70 kon-ce, labo a potahan no tasaay a loma'an o Yi-wen-kon-cen", potah no timolan amisan idaw ko nipisangan to Koo-cia gagikian ato koo-cia dadatokan, polong han pangangan o " Koo-cia tosaay a kitidaan", o mamikowan to migikiay no tatelongan. ya hekal idaw ko papahanhannan, o sasagikian no tabakiay a kitidaan, hina patinako to nipahelakan a toodan ato migikiay, no tayniay a namakacowacowaay a kanatalan no tademaw itinito pahalhal. tada sangan no loma'an, tabakiay a dadan, potah ato adawang o " Tay-wan-min-co-ci-nen-yen-ci" ko ngangan, o sin-cen-yen wenhoa cense wiyenhoy " aydaay a wen-hoa-po" patocekan o Koo-tin-ko-ci", walian a panan, cong-san-nan-lo makakenih ko dadan ato yen-ci o " cong-cen-ci-nen-tan" a ngangan o sapitoki i Tay-pei-se-cen-ho o wen-hoa-cen-kon. . loit歷史 aydaay a kakiningan a kitidaan, o caysiwseplim mihcaan "mince 38 mihcaan", kacokaymasan a Tay-wan-ze'-ce-se-ci-tay-wan-cen sanpaw citi, ato caysiwsipsip mihcaan " cawhe 19 mihcaan" sabaw cacay a bolat kalingatoan no hitay a sakacacay no tektekan. caysiwsiplim mihcaan Cong-hoa-min-koo miala mikowan to Tay-wan a nikodan, lawpes hanto kiya tosaay. caysiwlimsep mihcaan kataynian to no kaholaman, tastashanto, ina kitidaan mala no hitay a Con-se-lin-po, Lin-cin-con-se-li-po ato Sin-pin-se-lin-po a kitidaan. o lin-sen-nan-lo sipakayda mibetas ko dadan, Cong-cen-ci-nen-tan patideng sa sipakayda i sasa no lala' a mocolil. . tawyaay a Cong-ton mitosa a malaKoo-min-tan cong-cay ci Cing-con-ce itida i caysiwpiclim mihcaan sepat a bolad lima a demiad malibaloco' a mabelec, o sin-cen-yen ko malamikowanay to sakabelec a wi-yen-hoy, itawya to enemay a bolad patideng to Cong-ce-ci-nen-tan no sapikining to sabaw enem a tademawan no mikowanay, o sin-cen-yen itida i caysiwpicnem mihcaan cacay a bataan patideng to cong-cen-ci-nen-tan a ce-daw-wi-yen-hoy. nisingkiwan sato, o yen-san-ta-fan-tin ko misikiay ci Ying-coo-cen ko misikiay, o nisikian a loma mialato no Na-cin-cong-san-lin a waywayan. kilol sa i caysiwpicnem mihcaan cacay a bataan a bolat tolo a bataan idaw ko cacay a demiadan malingato mitahaw, caysiwpicpic mihcaan caycay a bolat milingato misakakawaw, mikawaway tina kawawan o Zon-min-kon-cen-kon-se, caysiwwalsep mihcaan tolo a bolad locay a demiad mahedek, sin-cen-yen patideng to " cong-cen-ci-nen-tan-kon-li-coo-pei-co'". ". caysiwwalsep sepat bolad sepat demiad, pilaksisikian no Cong-cen-ci-nen-tan ato nikapatayan ni Cen-con-ce polong han i tawya a sikawaw, makaala to sepat a malebot ko milaboay a tademaw, hekalay no kanatalan a tademaw makaala to sepat a lasoboan no tademaw, sakatosa a demiad taneng to tayda ko namakacowacowaay a tademaw tayda miadih, tawya a mihcaan pito a bolat cacay a demiad tatengan mala " cong-cen-ci-nen-tan konlico'", o Tay-pei-se-cen-ho ciw-yi-ci. caysiwwalnem mihcaan, cong-cen-ci-nen-tan somad han o ciw-yi-po mikowanay, mahedek to patideng to codad sa somad han ko ngangan o " Koo-li-cong-cen-ci-nen-tan-kon-li-co'". 1980年4月4日, ". caysiwsiwsep mihcaan tolo a bolat sikawaw to ye-pay-he-sye-wen, mapolong namin ko micodaday itida i con-cen-ci-nen-tang " aydaay a sakalihalay a potahan" mosaloimeng a moeneng, patahekal to sasakamoen to " kaysangen ko koo-min-ta-hoy", " lawpesen ko ton-yen-kan-long-se-ci-lin-se-tiw-kon", masasakamo to " koo-se-hoy-yi", ato " cen-cin-kay-ke-se-cin-pew" saepat a ayiwkiwan no sasakamoen. 1990年3 . tosepseppic mihcaan tolo bolat tosa demiad, ci Ceng-soy-pen siho a zitayan a ciw-yi-po somaden ko koo-li-con-cen-ci-nen-tang to koo-li-tay-wan-min-co-ci-nen-kon", hetiken malasakasepat a solaladan no ceng-ho, ina kawaw caay sipakayda i sin-cen to lipoing misomad a mihang, pahetiken no ciw-yi-po ko nipacaitan to aadihan ato paya no adawan a ta-cong-ce-cen a solitan, malawilaw namin ko katooday, kilolsa o Tay-pei-se-cen-ho-wen-hoa-ci o "wen-ce-hoa" hiyaen ko cong-cen-ci-nen-tan a cokedan, paya no ta-cen-ce-con, potah no kon-yen, langad ato salining, palasomamaday a liwan no babalaki sa. lima bolat cacay a bataan demiad, ciw-yi-po-cen ci To-cen-sen mihapo sato, patocek to " koo-li-tay-wan-min-co-ci-nen-kon a codadan". lima bolat sabaw siwa demiad, tawyaay a cong-ton ci Cen-soy-pen mihapo to tatengaay a ngangan. tosepseppic mihcaan sabaw cacay bolat siwa dimiad wen-cin-hoy o coked no koo-li-tay-wan-min-co-ci-nen-kon, misoayaway a kangpangan, sakalihalay a potahan, salining, solit han to koo-tin-ko-ci, nika caay kedai ko no pei-se-cen-ho nipatocekan to langan ato "ta-cong-ce-cen" no solitan. 2007年3月2日, "字樣. tosepsepwal mihcaan walo bolat tocay demiad, ni Ma-ing-ciw siho itida i sin-cen-yen pisasakamoan, pabesot han milawpes ko koo-li-tay-wan-min-co-ci-nen-kon-co-ce-koy-cen", tawya a demiad manokasen ko koo-li-con-cen-ci-nen-tang-kon-li-co'" a masakapotay. Tosepsepsiw mihcaan pito bolat sabaw pito demiad, saan ko wen-cin-hoy to koo-tin-ko-ci "Tay-wan-min-co-ci-nen-kon" somaden ko ngangan o Cong-cen-ci-nen-tan". tosepsepsiw mihcaan pito bolat tosep demiad, malingato aca pacait, nika i pananay a kangpang to solit " sakalihalay a potahan", caay pakabiti kina " ta-cong-ce-cen". 2008年8月21日, "掛回. tosepcaypic mihcaan tosa a bolat, ci Cay-ing-wen azitay no wen-hoa-po-cen ci Cen-li-con ko pacokelay tina cong-cen-kakiningan misomad, miawda to sitangahay a tademaw, pahetiken ko canancanan no ceng-cong-cen a toodan,pasaloimengen ko nipadadiwan to " Ceng-ko kakiningan a dadiwan", cong-cen-yi-lan, cea-se-tin, zoy-yen-tin, ce-cin-tin, min-lin-yi-lang, cay-yi-yi-lang, cong-cen gagikian no hatidaay a sapaadih to gagagikian pasomaden namin to aasipen to solit to tongdohan. tosa a bolat tosa a bataan idaw ko pito a demiad, o Cong-hoa-min-koo wen-hoa-po mihapo to sakay totowal kakiningan a kawawan matalaw a masasoidis ko syakayay a tademaw, nano tawya to tosa a bolat tosa a bataan idaw ko walo a dimiadan kalingatoan to mihmihcaan to tosa a bolat tosa a bataan idaw ko walo a deimadan a edepen namin ko cong-cen-ka kiningan mihibang tawya a demiad. 2017年2月, . kangpang 牌樓 kangpang no cong-cen-ci-nen-tan, misoayaw to cong-san-nan-lo ato koo-cia-to-so-kon, talakaw losep, ahebal walsep a koncean, o satabakiay no Tay-pei macimacian a kangpangan. o kangpang nipitocekan o " lima a lalomaan enem ko coked sabaw cacay ko nikatatongdohan, o Cong-hoa-min-koo satalakaway no sangaan a loma'an, hekal mahida o langdaway a demiadan a somilaway ato salengacay ko tadakolit. to mihmihcaan no kalimolakan no kanatalm, ya kangpang idaw ko nipipatata' to cacay a bataan no Cong-hoa-min-koo hataan. . satalakaway a kangpangan idaw ko solit to " ta-cong-ce-cen", ina kangpangan pangangan han to " ta-con-ce- tadapanan", tasepseppic mihcaan sabaw tosa a bolat walo a dimiad, somad han pangangan to " sakalihalay a potahan" sepatay a solitan. misomad henay, naidaw ko mibelihay ato patidengan a tademaw masasoliang. Tawyaay a nipadohepitan a solit o "ta-cong-ce-con" sepatay a solitan oniO-yeng-son a solitan, ci Cin-siw-yi kina patocekay, sayaway kahemekan ni Cin a midatengay a tademawan namaka ci Wan-yen-min nakamoan a codadan "con-si-lo", " bahalehan kina ta-cong-ce-con sipahetik". caay henay ka hetik, caay henay paheci ko sakakaay tina kawawan, tosaay to a mihcaan binacadan caay henay katineng cimaay hakiya kina misolitay, saan ko nipabaliw hakiya ci Cing-con-cen kina misolitayto sa." katokoh to tosepseppic a mihcaan to nipilawpesan tina ka cinglawan a kawawan, misolitay to hodi a tademaw ci Yeng-cia-lin sakamosa misolitay a tademaw namaka o colay, telay o tawso ko sapatomi' to somanahay a lala' ko sapisolit. tawyaay miawda to matinengay to hodian no misolitay a tademaw patocekan no heni awnio-ti a solitan sa, acaay kaloo-kon, amipatocek to niedawan a tokian, tawya misolit. " ta-cong-min", " ta-siw-min" nida to a nisolitan. .
